News Editor

Catherine Luther was recently promoted to Director of School of Journalism PERIOD

Catherine Luthers office is sparse PERIOD There are boxes piled high and her desk is a small one more appropriate for a dorm than an office PERIOD At least it is for now until she finishes moving into her new office as the director of the School of Journalism and Electronic Media PERIOD

Luther has received several awards for excellence in administration research and teaching including the  University of Tennessee Notable Woman Award John Ben Snow Memorial Trust Fellowship Award the Radio Television News Directors Foundation or Knight Foundations Educator in the Newsroom Fellowship Award and the International Radio and Television Society Faculty or Industry Award PERIOD The University of Tennessee College of Communication and Information has also awarded her the Bud Minkel International or Intercultural Award and the Outstanding Faculty Research award PERIOD

She has been the author and coauthor of numerous scholarly articles and papers as well as a book Press Images National Identity and Foreign Policy A Case Study of U.S PERIOD  Japan Relations from . additionally she was awarded the Fulbright Research Grant to conduct research in Japan in  PERIOD

Growing up in a military family Luther has travelled the world since birth PERIOD As the daughter of a JapaneseAmerican mother and IrishGerman father she was born in an army base in Japan but she considers Maryland where she spent her high school years her home state PERIOD

As an undergraduate Luther attended the University of Maryland where she double majored in East Asian Studies and Mass Communication PERIOD

She has always been fascinated by politics and political relations since these were topics of conversation in her home PERIOD

Her background is what inspired her career decisions PERIOD Luther shared what initially attracted her to journalism PERIOD

This notion of serving the public and informing the public about different events and stories and issues that they normally would not even think about or be exposed to motivated me Luther said PERIOD

While holding this belief despite the worlds changing attitude about the media she offered advice to others studying communications PERIOD

You really have to have a passion with regard to informing people and creating compelling messages and stories Luther said PERIOD Never give up PERIOD When you get into this field you might have a bad experience  but you can move around and learn with each position. her hobbies are ones most people share listening to music going to movies and traveling PERIOD And food she said with a laugh PERIOD I love food different kinds of food. of course she loves to travel PERIOD Even in her spare time she enjoys reading about other countries their politics culture and people PERIOD

Every location that I go to I feel that it is making me more wellrounded and Im getting a deeper understanding of individuals Luther said PERIOD

Even if she does not know the language she enjoys interacting with others reaching some level of communication and getting to know the authentic culture away from the tourism PERIOD

I always try to go into places to get a sense of how people live everyday lives instead of just the areas serving tourists Luther said PERIOD Its really those areas where you tend to have the really great food too. deborah Douglas who retired Aug PERIOD  has worked in the School of Journalism for  years and with Luther since  PERIOD

Weve always had a good work relationship Douglas said PERIOD And if she was not retiring soon she said I wouldnt mind working with her as the new director of the School of Journalism and Electronic Media. luther received her Ph.D PERIOD from the University of Minnesota Twin Cities with a major in mass communication and a minor in political psychology PERIOD

She has been with UT since  PERIOD It was the first academic position she started despite offers from other institutions PERIOD Her mentor suggested Tennessee and she applied for the position because she had never lived in the South PERIOD

As far as staying with UT Luther said The university  has been quite good to me PERIOD I think it really does care about its employees and its students PERIOD

Weve been very lucky especially recently to have administrators who want to make a difference and make the campus better for faculty students and staff she said PERIOD

Luther was chosen to be the director by both an internal committee and the Dean of the College of Communication and Information Michael Wirth PERIOD Wirth said the process was a shared governance. wirth said Luther was the only applicant for the senior position PERIOD However it still meant she had to go through the full interview process typical of all applicants PERIOD Ultimately she was unanimously selected by the committee a decision that Wirth agreed with PERIOD

Luther is currently serving a 5year term until her position is renewed by the dean of the the College of Communication and Information PERIOD

Wirth said about the director position Theyre in charge of leading the faculty and helping the faculty strategically plan for how to get better how to be outstanding even more so than they are now PERIOD Its critical we have great people in those positions and Catherines one of those people. news Editor
